info.sourceTextContent: Espántase, huye de allí; y por ser el más cercano, según su cuenta, da en el pueblo del narrador y refiere lo que ha visto. Acude éste allá por su cargo, acompañado en debida forma, y resulta verdad lo denunciado por el pastor.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Frightening, flee from there, and for being the closest, according to his account, gives the people the narrator relates what he has seen. It goes back in his office, accompanied by appropriate way, and truth is denounced by the pastor
